mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (member_seq, photo_uciCode, bookName, regDate) VALUES (#{member_seq}, #{photo_uciCode}, #{bookName}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_seq, photo_uciCode, bookName, regDate FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq}
SELECT seq, member_seq, photo_uciCode, bookName, regDate FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} AND photo_uciCode = #{photo_uciCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} AND photo_uciCode = #{photo_uciCode}
